buginformation.summary: break finally block isn optimized properly
buginformation.description: try throw quot throw quot finally fake catcher break console log quot then quot gets optimized into throw quot throw quot which not the same the break the finally block should prevent the exception from being passed the expected result console log quot then quot ecma 262 says the production try statement try block finally evaluated follows let the result evaluating block let the result evaluating finally type normal return return type this case would break and not normal break overrides the throw this with the build available for download feb 2013 thanks for the report this issue was closed revision 211dc 0161ae
